metadata.title: CVE-2019-19529 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel before 5.3.11, there is a use-after-free bug that canbe caused by a malicious USB device in the drivers/net/can/usb/mcba_usb.cdriver, aka CID-4d6636498c41.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
